ModMetaData.name: Klawtherian
ModMetaData.author: alite
ModMetaData.description:
This mod was created in response to a request to add Klawtherian to the game, a xenotype full of polytheistic warriors who trive in colder climates. You'll encounter both as tribal allies you may trade with, and pirates scouring the land.
[url=https://github.com/KonradHeinser/Klawtherian][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url] [url=https://ko-fi.com/alite56114][img]https://i.imgur.com/Utx6OIH.png[/img][/url]
